name: Apex Cube - Jump to the Top FREE
name_original: Apex Cube - Jump to the Top FREE
description:
Get on this galactic adventure!

Help your little cube reach the top of the block mountain. Be aware, the apex is not easy to reach! Jump around, avoid shooting balls and lightning strikes and find out new strategies to reach the highest cube.

Collect shiny stars to unlock new characters.

Features:
- Free to play!
- Challenging levels
- 8 different characters
- Crisp graphics
- Awesome music and sound effects
- Collecting stars to unlock new characters
- Leaderboards
- Ultimate 'one more try' reaction game
- Endless gameplay
- Compete with players from all over the globe!
- Addictive and fun for all ages!

Apex Cube is free to download and offers in-app purchases. This adventurous casual game is made by Game.IO - the creators of Yatzy Ultimate, Light the Light and many other social games.
We’d be more than happy to hear your thoughts on Apex Cube so don’t forget to review the game or you can simply contact us at support@game.io.

The music is created by Jamie Nord - a video game music composer and music producer.
